title: QuizerJS
subtitle: A powerful quiz library built with {{editorjs}} and {{wsx}}.

multipleTypes.title: Multiple Question Types
multipleTypes.description: Support for single choice, multiple choice, text input, true/false, and more question types.

modernUI.title: Modern UI
modernUI.description: Beautiful interface built with wsx components, fully responsive design.

editorjsIntegration.title: Editor.js Integration
editorjsIntegration.description: Integrate as an Editor.js tool plugin.

modular.title: Modular Design
modular.description: Core components can be used independently with flexible configuration.

typeSafe.title: Type Safe
typeSafe.description: Complete TypeScript type definitions and validation for better development experience.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

readyOutOfBox.title: Ready Out of the Box
readyOutOfBox.description: Get started immediately with built-in features:

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Get up and running in minutes.

poweredBy.title: Built by Us, Designed by You
poweredBy.description: Fully customizable to match your brand and design requirements.
